title: Ball O' Hurt
summaries: The Ball O' Hurt is a type of flail that is obtainable by destroying a Shadow Orb, or by looting a Corrupt Crate(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) that is obtained by fishing in the Corruption. It emits small particles similar to those of other objects in the Corruption.

It is particularly useful when fighting worm-type <linked>enemies</linked> or the <linked>Eater of Worlds</linked> <linked>boss</linked>, since it does relatively constant damage to the multiple segments.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.
